data.title: Fred Ward Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about Fred Ward on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature Fred Ward including Sweet Home Alabama, 2 Guns, and more.
data.text:
What I Am

Addison doubts her abilities as a doctor, Cristina pushes Burke's rehabilitation, one of the interns suffers their own medical emergency, and Izzie receives the surprise of her life.

Maybe Tomorrow

Paul works the prostitute angle while Frank receives the first casualty in a secret war, and steps back into a world he'd left behind.

The D.B. Cooper Job

A dying FBI Agent's greatest failure â allowing skyjacker D.B. Cooper to escape justice â becomes Nate's obsession, as we flashback to the '70s to solve one of America's great mysteries.

Reason to Believe

Abby and Kovac argue about a diagnosis when a woman comes in with signs of spousal abuse. After a group of confused homeless kids enters the emergency room, Gates, Abby and Neela must quickly determine one child's ailment before it is too late. Meanwhile, Weaver is unexpectedly called into action while doing a news report at a school.
